note: Anthropologist, experimental archaeologist, historian, and community organizer. My work focuses on the social and environmental impacts of the neolithic revolution, and how understanding these impacts can provide us with solutions to the sixth mass extinction. For 20 years I have been a catalyst in the human rewilding movement. Rewilding is a framework that sees the world in terms of regeneration and reciprocity. Iâ€™m the host of the Rewilding Podcast. Follow me for all things rewilding!
